RainbruRPG::Core::IrrFontManager

RainbruRPG::Core::IrrFontManager Class Reference

#include <irrfontmanager.h>

Collaboration diagram for RainbruRPG::Core::IrrFontManager:

List of all members.

Detailed Description

A singleton to help changing irrlicht font.

Irrlicht uses irr::gui::IGUIFont instances to set fonts. But we can only set the default font in irr::gui::IGUISkin and set override font in irr::gui::IGUIStaticText, irr::gui::IGUIEditBox, irr::gui::IGUIButton.

The problem appears with the console. The Console's listBox wich can have his own font. So we must have a global font in courrier and then override the font in the other widgets.

IrrFontManager can setGlobalFont(stringw fontName, stringw size), setWidgetFont([widget], stringw fontName, stringw size) where widget can be irr::gui::IGUIStaticText, irr::gui::IGUIEditBox and irr::gui::IGUIButton.
